description: Bruno Dey, 93, is handed a two-year suspended prison sentence by a court in Germany.
title: Bruno Dey: Former Nazi guard found guilty over mass murder at Stutthof Camp
title_page: Bruno Dey: Former Nazi guard found guilty over mass murder at Stutthof Camp - BBC News
maintext: In his last statement to the court, he said he had been "shaken" by the witness accounts and apologised to "those who went through the hell of this madness". However, he added that he had not been aware of the "extent of the atrocities" until the trial.
